channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Fifty Shades of Grey’ author E.L. James lists her L.A. mansion for $7.25 million
item.description: Author E.L. James has put her sprawling Los Angeles home on the market for $7.25 million—having slashed a staggering $1 million from her original aski...

item.title: ‘I don’t want to step on any toes’: I manage an $80K trust for a 15-year-old relative. How do I deal with interfering relatives?
item.description: “I also want to teach my young relative good money habits without overstepping the parents’ authority.”

item.title: Is the stock market open on MLK Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
item.description: The Monday holiday commemorates the birth of civil rights leader Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: ‘I’m considering driving Lyft part time’: I’m 58 with a $1 million home. Do I finally give up work and enjoy life?
item.description: “One thought is for me to stop working at age 60, while my wife continues for two more years at her teaching job.”

item.title: My mom, 90, has dementia. My brother wants her to buy a $500K house near his house. Does that make any sense?
item.description: “I can’t, for the life of me, see how this makes sense on any level — personal or financial.”

item.title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Post-earnings gains for Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs, as well as a rally in chips, helped lift the major averages to a positive session Thursday.

item.title: Why a diversified approach to income is ‘essential’ right now, according to UBS
item.description: The investment bank lays out what investors should consider in the way of income this year.

item.title: AI trade back on? The company behind chip leaders like Nvidia and AMD just raised its spending forecast
item.description: Robust earnings results from chip manufacturing giant TSMC just gave a huge lift to the AI trade.

item.title: Retail investors have a new favorite trade
item.description: Individual investors are piling into the silver trade.

item.title: 3M heads into earnings exemplifying market shift to value, with plenty of room to rally
item.description: The maker of Post-it Notes and protective healthcare gear and masks has been on a slow and steady rise going back to its 2023 lows.
